title.value: Влияние доз регуляторов роста растений на элементы структуры урожая озимого рапса
Influence of dozes of plant growth regulators  on yield structure elements of winter rape
Influence of dozes of plant growth regulators  on yield structure elements of winter rape

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Andrusevich, A.M., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Influence of regulators of growth of plants (Gidrogumat and Maltamin) on elements of structure of yielding capacity winter rape (Brassica napus) was studied in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. Plant growth regulators raised weight of 1000 seeds on 0,2-0,5 g and weight of seeds from one plant on 1,5-2,7 g. The maximal biological productivity of oilseeds (33,8-50,4 c/hectares) winter rape grades the Leader forms at entering a regulator of growth Maltamin into a doze of 1,0 l/hectares in a phase the beginning budding and in a doze of 1,0 l/hectares in a phase full budding. The regulator of growth Gidrogumat the Maximal biological productivity winter rape has provided at entering into a doze of 1,5 l/hectares in a phase the beginning budding and in a doze of 1,5 l/hectares in a phase full budding.
